title: Laidback Northern Beaches Studio Stay Between Manly & Palm Beach
description:
Soak up the sun, escape the crowds and enjoy the laidback Northern Beaches lifestyle with a relaxing stay at Narrabeen Sands Hotel by Nightcap Plus. Tantalisingly close to the acclaimed Collaroy Beach, and just a 10-minute drive from Long Reef Point Lookout, Narrabeen Sands Hotel by Nightcap Plus is the perfect base from which to discover the Northern Beaches' treasure trove of natural wonders and outdoor adventures.

Pairing modern hotel facilities, fantastic dining and outstanding service with spacious accommodation, this is an enchanting home-away-from-home, where you can rest in complete comfort after long days in the sun - all just a 35-minute drive from Sydney's CBD.
location_description: Narrabeen Sands Hotel by Nightcap Plus
